admin().details: Function to check the admin of the assetAdmin: the account that can unfreeze and force transfer

freezer().details: Function to check the freezer of the assetFreezer: the account that can freeze an asset

issuer().details: Function to check the issuer of the assetIssuer: the account that can issue tokens for an asset

owner().details: Function to check the owner of the asset

devdoc.title: Extension of the ERC20 interface that allows users to get the account capable of fullfiling different asset roles
